protocol.text: The datasets were subjected to the Robust Multiarray Averaging (RMA) normalization method. The normalized data were further analyzed and p-values were generated by the affymGUI component of Bioconductor in statistics environment R with the default parameters.Genes were selected by the RankProd (non-paramteric method based on the estimated percentage of false discoveries (p value < 0.05)) method. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA signal
Six-day-old wild type and rsa1-1 mutant plants were subjected to salt stress with 120 mM NaCl for 0 and 24 h.

Arabidopsis seedlings on Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium agar plates (1x MS salts, 2% sucrose, 1.2% agar, pH 5.7) were grown under cool, white light (~120 Î¼mol m-2 s-1) at 21 C with a 16-h-light/8-h-dark photoperiod.
Total RNA was extracted with Trizol reagent (Invitrogen) following the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA was hybridized for 16 h at 45 C on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChips. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
